survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of the employee onboarding process to identify areas of improvement and ensure new hires feel supported and prepared in their roles.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of your onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of your onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: Which onboarding activities did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox inputs. Ensure 'Other' option includes an open-text field if selected.

script.question_text: Which onboarding activities did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How clear were the job expectations and responsibilities communicated during onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point scale. Avoid leading language.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Display options vertically.

script.question_text: How clear were the job expectations and responsibilities communicated during onboarding?
